item.description: å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£ - https://docs.python.org/zh-cn/3/library/threading.html çº¿ç¨‹ åˆ›å»ºå­çº¿ç¨‹ - threading.Thread() qqimport threading def func(i): print(i) threading.Thread(target = func, args = (1,)) è®¡ç®—è¿è¡Œæ—¶é—´ import threading, time def target(arg): ... if __name__ == '__main__' start = time.time() threads = [] for i in range(5): thread = threading.Thread(target = target, args = (i,)) thread.start() threads.append(thread) for thread in threads: thread.join() end = time.time()
